root.title: Azure Service Principal Removed
root.description: Identifies when a service principal was removed in Azure.
root.author: Austin Songer @austinsonger

falsepositives.item: Service principal being removed may be performed by a system administrator.
Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment.
Service principal removed from unfamiliar users should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
